sentences.sContent: The ambrosial aroma of the roast whetted our appetites.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ambrosial aroma of the roast whetted our appetites.
sentences.sCn: 烤肉的美味香气刺激了我们的食欲。

sentences.sContent: The ambrosial and essential part of the fruit is lost with the bloom which is rubbed off in the market cart , and they become mere provender .
sentences.sContent_eng: The ambrosial and essential part of the fruit is lost with the bloom which is rubbed off in the market cart , and they become mere provender .
sentences.sCn: 水果的美味和它那本质的部分，在装上了车子运往市场去的时候，跟它的鲜丽一起给磨损了，它变成了仅仅是食品。

remMethod.val: ambrosia (美食， 神的食物) + l → 特别美味的

words.tran: 适用于神的（等于ambrosial）；美味的
特别美味的食物；神的食物

trans.tranCn: 芳香的， 特别美味的
